title: Question 3
prompt:
Sentence 9:I know that Amanda hopes to move into a more responsible position in Marketing, and I believe that she is up to the task.

Which is the best way to write the underlined portion of the sentence? If the original is the best way, choose option (A).
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The error in the sentence is the capitalization of the word “Marketing.” A word is capitalized if it is at the beginning of the sentence or if it is a proper noun. A proper noun is the name of a specific individual, organization, place, or object, such as “Cesar Chavez,” “President Truman,” “United Nations,” “Baghdad,” or “World Health Organization.” “Marketing” is not at the beginning of the sentence, and it is not a proper noun. “Marketing” should not be capitalized, and so answer E is correct.


I know that Amanda hopes to move into a more responsible position in marketing, and I believe that she is up to the task.
